newsitem.title: USA: TABLE-Digital Equipment Q4 shr profit $0.75.
newsitem.headline: TABLE-Digital Equipment Q4 shr profit $0.75.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
Note: Analysts consensus for the quarter was $0.73 per share, according to First Call.
The 1996 quarter included a restructuring charge of $492 million.

The company reported operating profit for the quarter of 120.3 millon compared to a loss of $449.9 million for the quarter, and a profit of $130.2 million compared to a loss of $115.5 million for the year.
The company reported as "other income/expense" $20.4 million compared to $17.4 million for the quater.
In the fourth quarter of 1997, other income/expenses includes $33 million of interest income, $22 million in interest expense and $9 million in gains on divestment.
In the fourth quarter of 1996, it includes $20 million in interest income, $25 million in interest expense and $23 million in net gains on divestments.
